text: The JAC Refine M4 is a Minivan made by JAC Motors since 2016. == History and Features == The JAC Refine M4 was debuted at the Beijing Auto Show in 2016. its positioned above the JAC Refine M3 and has a design that is similar to the Toyota Alphard the minivan has 2.0 liter both turbo and standard petrol engines and a 1.9 liter turbo diesel engine with 5 and 6-speed manual transmissions it was improved in 2018. the improvement brought a hybrid version that combines a 1.5 liter turbo petrol engine with a electric motor. There's also a electric version called JAC Refine E4 this version was launched in 2023 and has a 130 kW electric motor. == Markets == The JAC Refine M4 is sold mainly in China. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:Vans Category:2020s automobiles Category:Minivans
title: JAC Refine M4
